drupalNodeEvent.title: Integration or Decoupling: What Lies Ahead?

field_speakers.processed: Weiyi Shi (UC San Diego), Yeling Tan (University of Oregon), Jack Zhang (University of Kansas), Moderated by Samantha Vortherms (UC Irvine)

field_description.processed:
This is the first in a two-part series on the US Elections and the Future of the Trade War. In this webinar, panelists will discuss how the outcome of the November elections will either preserve or adjust American policies and attitudes toward the US-China trade war. With China a central focus of both candidates' foreign policy agendas, what implications will the elections have on global trade and competition?

The second webinar in this series, "What Will the Trade War Mean for Class Politics?", will be held on December 1. Please register separately for both events.
